string-array.name: jokes
string-array.item: Why did the computer go to the doctor? Because it had a virus!
What do you call a kangaroo who loves to play basketball? A hoop jumper!
Why do cows wear bells? Because their horns dont work!
Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
What do you call a crab who plays baseball? A pinch hitter!
Why did the chicken cross the playground? To get to the other slide!
What do you call a frog who loves to travel? A hopper explorer!
Why did the cookie go to the doctor? Because it was feeling crummy!
What do you call a bear who loves to dance? A bear boogie!
Why did the banana go to the doctor? Because it wasnt peeling well!
What do you call a fish who wears a bowtie? Sophis-ti-cat!
Why did the robot go on a diet? Because it had too many mega-bytes!
What do you call a bird who loves to shop? A mallard!
Why did the bike fall over? Because it was two-tired!
What do you call a dinosaur who loves to sing? A trex-o-lot!
Why did the vegetable go to the beach? To get a little sun-pepper!
